content.rendered: When you walk through a casino, you often will see many gamblers wearing green aventurine jewelry to increase their chances of winning. Aventurine jewelry or crystals can help in situations where your actions or outcome is out of your control, making it the perfect gemstone to wear while gambling, betting or even on a first date. An aventurine bracelet, such as our Wealth Bracelet, is one of the luckiest gemstone pieces you can wear and is thought to boost your chances in any situation.

excerpt.rendered: Aventurine is one of the most powerful gemstones for good luck, wealth and to manifest greater prosperity.
